id: scenario-social-medium-child-scenarios-family-child creates first contribution within family circle
title: Child creates first contribution within family circle
description: Child creates first contribution within family circle
content:
Scenario: Child creates first contribution within family circle
    Given Emma wants to share her art project with her family
    When she creates a contribution with a photo of her drawing
    And she writes "I made this at school today!"
    Then the contribution is immediately visible to all family members
    And it stays within the family circle by default
    And family members can respond with encouragement
    And the guardian agent tracks this as positive creative expression
    And Emma learns that sharing creates connection
